story.kicker_image_caption: University of Calcutta Admissions 2016: Apply before June 17
story.storykicker: The eligible candidates should apply latest by June 17.
story.storybody:
The University of Calcutta (CU) has invited applications from eligible candidates for admissions in the Bachelor of Arts Bachelor of Law (B.A LL.B) programme in the Department of Law, University of Calcutta for the session 2016-17. The eligible candidates should apply latest by June 17.

Educational qualification:
The candidates should have passed the class 12 from a recognised board or institute.

Selection procedure:
The candidates will be selected on the basis of their performance in a written test.

How to apply:
The eligible candidates should apply through the official website, the link for which is http://www.caluniv.ac.in/.

Application fee:
General: An application fee of Rs 300 needs to be paid by the candidates for the process of registration.

SC/ST/PwD: An application fee of Rs 150 needs to be paid by the candidates for the process of registration.

Important dates:

  • Commencement of online application: June 3
  • Last date to apply online: June 17
  • Download of admit card: June 23 to June 25
  • Date of entrance exam: June 26

For more information regarding the admission, the candidates are advised to visit the official website.

Get latest updates on exam notifications and scholarships across India and abroad here.
